snippet: Ending a stormy five-year tenure marred by the disastrous rollout of President Obama’s signature legislative achievement, Kathleen Sebelius is resigning as secretary of Health and Human Services.
abstract: Health and Human Services Sec Kathleen Sebelius is resigning, ending stormy five-year tenure marred by disastrous rollout of Pres Obama's Affordable Care Act; Obama accepts her resignation and will nominate Office of Management and Budget Director Sylvia Mathews Burwell to replace her.
lead_paragraph: Ending a stormy five-year tenure marred by the disastrous rollout of President Obama’s signature legislative achievement, Kathleen Sebelius is resigning as secretary of Health and Human Services.

headline.main: Sebelius Resigns After Troubles Over Health Site
headline.print_headline: Sebelius Resigns After Troubles Over Health Site

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
